comment.author: 96684819@N00
comment._content: Hi, I'm an admin for a group called 1910s Fashion, and we'd love to have this added to the group!

comment.author: 21042979@N00
comment._content: Laura Spelman Rockefeller's head is huge in this photo. It does look like a head/hat was edited onto that body, especially when viewed close up. I downloaded the image, saw a blurry section above her head, and a white section around the right side of her face, and saw that his face and coat had been hand-outlined also. Possibly she had a blurred face, and the newspaper wanted a clear shot of her to publish? I did find another image online of this same train trip. She has on the same or a very similar dress coat. TITLE:John Davison Rockefeller, 1839-1937 CALL NUMBER:BIOG FILE - Rockefeller, John Davison, 1839-1937 [item] [P&P] REPRODUCTION NUMBER:LC-USZ62-55926 (b&w film copy neg.) SUMMARY:1/2 length, standing, facing left, and wife; railroad? conductor behind them. MEDIUM:1 photographic print. CREATED/PUBLISHED:c1911 July 13. NOTES: J157560 U.S. Copyright Office This record contains unverified, old data from caption card. Caption card tracings: PI; Shelf. Sources checked: www. R-, Laura C. Spelman, d. 1915. REPOSITORY:Library of Congress Prints and Photographs Division Washington, D.C. 20540 USA DIGITAL ID:(b&w film copy neg.) cph 3b03804 CONTROL #:2004679693 popartmachine.com/item/pop_art/LOC+1082712/JOHN-DAVISON-R....

comment.author: 35072786@N08
comment._content: My Symbiosis: Thanks for finding the related image of the same train trip. The link to this photo in the Prints and Photographs Online Catalog is: hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/cph.3b03804 We will also add Laura Spelman Rockefeller's fuller name to the description when we update.

comment._content: Welcome. My goal wasn't really to find that, but to check on the "big head," however, I'm glad to helped with referencing. :)
